# Dogs

### Installation

`npm install dogs`

### Examples

```
var dogs = require('dogs')

dogs.dog()

 /^ ^\
/ 0 0 \
V\ Y /V
 / - \
 |    \
 || (__V

dogs.snoopy()

        O_      __)(
      ,'  `.   (_\"..
     :      :    /|`
     |      |   ((|_  ,-.
     ; -   /:  ,'  `:(( -\
     /   -'  `: _____\\\-:
    _\__   ___|____  \___|_
   ;    | |        '-`     :
  :_____|:|_________________:
  ;     |:|                  :
 :      |:|                   :
 ;_______`'___________________:
:                              :
|______________________________|
 `---.--------------------.---'
     |____________________|
     |                    |
     |____________________|
     |                    |
_\\|_\\|_\\/(__\\__)\\__\\//_|(_
